definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Patients in the Saimeian powder group took the Saimeian powder with rivanol gauze for external application everyday after operations.
sentences.chinese: 賽黴安散組術後每天予外用賽黴安散和雷佛奴爾紗條。

sentences.english: In addition, Chinese external medicine provided necessary support for treating ulcer after the surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中藥外用藥的應用對創面的癒合提供了有力保障。

sentences.english: Health Garcinia for external use only.
Intravenous preparations take more risk than oral preparation and externally applied agent.
sentences.chinese: 靜脈給藥製劑相對口服和外用製劑而言，風險較大。

sentences.english: It was originally a treatment for skin external use.
sentences.chinese: 它原是一種治療皮膚病的外用藥。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of artesunate in topical treatment on mice's psoriasis like animal model.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究青蒿琥酯外用對銀屑病樣小鼠模型的影響。

sentences.english: External use: use accordingly for washing with decoction or make into powder and use as paste.
sentences.chinese: 外用適量，常用來煎湯薰洗，或研末調敷。

sentences.english: And this is for external use , not for oral administration .
sentences.chinese: 這是用外用藥，不可內服。

sentences.english: The treatment with 8% glycolic acid remained during the chemical peeling period.
sentences.chinese: 兩次化學脫皮期間仍外用8%羥基乙酸。

sentences.english: Conclusion The study shows that before UV irradiation, the external used medicines and cosmetics must be wiped.
sentences.chinese: 結論紫外線照射前應儘量將局部外用藥擦淨。

sentences.english: And they'll have strong wires round them for safety.
sentences.chinese: 而且箱外用牢固的鐵絲捆緊，以保安全。

sentences.english: Aim To establish a method for the determination of ketoconazole in compound ketoconazole powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立酮康唑的外用複方散劑的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: The effects of the four different treatment were then compared with eachother.
sentences.chinese: 並分析了上述幾種外用藥的治療效果。

sentences.english: Can use " Ma Yinglong haemorrhoid creams " external use went.
sentences.chinese: 可以用“馬應龍痔瘡膏”外用就行了。

sentences.english: Topical and oral ivermectin has been linked to an increased risk of bladder cancers.
sentences.chinese: 外用與口服愛滅蟲已關聯至增加更多膀胱癌的風險。

sentences.english: All of the topical retinoids effectively treat actinically damaged skin.
sentences.chinese: 所有外用類維他命A都能有效治療光損壞皮膚。

definition: to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
